data.title: Virginia: Eastern Winery
data.meta_description: An eastern Virginia winery-wedding venue! Here you'll find a complete list of all eastern Virginia's wineries ready to welcome your winery-wedding day.
data.text:
Hampton Roads, located at White Oak Farm where horses were raised in 1898 for the New York City carriage trade, is now where grapes are grown, wine made, cattle raised, home to the World’s Tallest Goat Tower, and where exquisite weddings take place inside and on the grounds of a Victorian mansion.

6074 New Design Road

Elberon, VA 23846

Telephone: 757 899-0203

Web: www.hamptonroadswinery.com

Photo: Courtesay Hampton Roads Winery

In the delightful rural community of Wicomico Church, on a peaceful 150-acre waterfront parcel with its own private cove, your guests may arrive either by land or water. Celebrate in the Tasting Room and adjacent Dining Room overlooking the vineyards.

619 Train Lane P.O Box 338

Wicomico Church, 22579

Telephone: 804 580

Web: www.jaceyvineyards.com

Photo: Courtesy Jacey Vineyards

A variety of spaces can be tailored to provide the perfect wedding, large or small. The spacious Tasting Room features a wood floor and high ceilings. Combine with the roofed Entrance Porch or Back Porch, also roofed and overlooking a brick Courtyard. . The gracious Pavilion Tent includes a dance floor. The Barrel Room is a romantic venue for small gatherings.

8400 Old Church Road

New Kent, Virginia 23124

Telephone: 804 932-8240

Web: www.newkentwinery.com

Photo: Courtesy New Kent Winery

Surrounded by 320 acres of vineyards and green space, yet minutes away from Colonial Williamsburg, a variety of private rooms are available for celebrations large and small. A particularly romantic outdoor spot for ceremonies includes a lush backdrop of vineyard views.

5800 Wessex Hundred

Williamsburg, VA 23185

Telephone: 757 229-0999

Web: www.williamsburgwinery.com

Photo: Courtesy Williamsburg Winery

A working farm for four centuries, in an enchanting area of small towns and waterside villages between the Atlantic and Chesapeake Bay, Chatham awaits your wedding day in a setting of historic out buildings and lovingly renovated houses with tented spaces available on the winery lawn and in the vineyard.

9232 Chatham road

Machipango, VA 23405

Telephone: 757 678-5588

Web: www.chathamvineyards.net

Photo: Courtesy Chatham Vineyards & Winery

On 100 acres in the heart of Northern Neck, referred to by George Washing as ” the garden of Virginia,” the handsomely restored Manor House awaits as the backdrop to your celebration. Other venues include the Carriage House; the Tasting Room, a blend of yesterday and today; and the Vines Room.

1618 Weldons Drive

Hauge, VA 22469

Telephone: 804 366-1404

Web: www.generalridgevineyard.com

Photo: Courtesy General’s Ridge Vineyard
